title: Trump undercuts his lawyers with tweets about travel ban
text: Speedy action was needed precisely to allow the government to develop new vetting procedures for people seeking to enter the U.S., the lawyers said. The process of coming up with new vetting procedures was put on hold when lower-court judges blocked Trump's order from taking effect, they told the high court.
summary:
Speedy action was needed precisely to allow the government to develop new vetting procedures for people seeking to enter the U.S., the lawyers said.
The process of coming up with new vetting procedures was put on hold when lower-court judges blocked Trump's order from taking effect, they told the high court.
